DESCRIPTION

  • Purchasing a domain is when you reserve the use of a domain for a period of 1 year. A domain does not automatically come with email or website hosting services. If you require those services and not a parked domain, please visit the main catalogue page again and select a Hosting Package that includes domain, hosting and email services.
  • You can use the domain availability checker below, then confirm your preferred domain in the next section of this ordering process.
  • The domain will belong to you for a period of 1 year. A renewal fee will then be quoted.
  • Once order is placed we will be in contact within 4 working hours via email

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code admin_label=”Domain Availability Checker” _builder_version=”4.11.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”] Domain Availability Checker[/et_pb_code][et_pb_text admin_label=”Important Notes” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#111111″ link_font=”||||on||||dotted” link_text_color=”#333333″ header_3_font=”|600||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#111111″ header_3_font_size=”14px” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”20px|20px||20px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

IMPORTANT NOTES

  • These are the product Terms & Conditions.
  • Refund & Return Policy.
